flaw_data.description: Guide hand thumb interfering with ball trajectory during follow-through
flaw_data.plain_language: Your guide hand thumb is interfering with the shot during follow-through. Keep your thumb passive - no flicking motion.
flaw_data.coaching_tip: Keep your guide hand passive. No thumb movement - it should be completely still during release.
flaw_data.drill_suggestion: One-handed shooting: Practice with only your shooting hand to eliminate guide hand interference.

detailed_flaws.description: Guide hand thumb interfering with ball trajectory during follow-through
detailed_flaws.plain_language: Your guide hand thumb is interfering with the shot during follow-through. Keep your thumb passive - no flicking motion.
detailed_flaws.coaching_tip: Keep your guide hand passive. No thumb movement - it should be completely still during release.
detailed_flaws.drill_suggestion: One-handed shooting: Practice with only your shooting hand to eliminate guide hand interference.

detailed_flaws.description: Follow-through timing could be improved for better consistency
detailed_flaws.plain_language: Your follow-through timing needs work. Hold your form until the ball reaches the rim for consistent backspin.
detailed_flaws.coaching_tip: Hold your follow-through until the ball hits the rim. Think "reach into the cookie jar."
detailed_flaws.drill_suggestion: Follow-through freeze: Hold your follow-through position for 3 seconds after each shot.

detailed_flaws.description: Advanced analysis detected jerky or rushed shooting motion lacking smooth rhythm
detailed_flaws.remedy_tip: Focus on smooth, rhythmic motion from start to finish. Practice shooting in slow motion to develop muscle memory.
detailed_flaws.exercise_tip: Practice the complete shooting motion without a ball, focusing on fluid movement.
detailed_flaws.plain_language: Your shot motion shows jerky movement (fluidity score: 0.5/100). Work on smoother, more rhythmic motion from start to finish.
